posts.post_content:
Posted By: Cat
I got these cards in a large Mastro lot.  I believe the two cards that were graded AUTH are because the top edges are rough.  Perhaps if these cards were resubmitted they would get a numeric grade, but I am not not sure.  Today I am going to open it up for someone who wants them all for $370.  If no one wants them all, tomorrow morning I'll open it up, at the prices below for anyone who wants a single card.  The ungraded cards may not get a numeric grade, but I am happy to e-mail these scans so you can see for yourself.  I suspect they were not sent into get grades because of the front paperloss.  As you see them below is exactly how I received them from Mastro.  Shipping is included in price.  If you want insurance, I'll add that at cost.  First to say:  "I'll take them" in an e-mail gets them.


Prices:

Breitenstein SGC 30 - $85
Dunn - $45
McElveen SGC A- $55
Purdue - SGC A - $65
Rossman - $45
Street SGC 30 - $80
Summers - $45
